mapper.select: SELECT T1.id as studio_id,T1.name,T1.cover,T1.banner,T1.summary,T2.name as create_by, (SELECT title FROM cky_honor WHERE studio_id=T1.id and del_flg=0 and is_show=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS show_honor FROM cky_studio as t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS T2 ON T1.create_user=T2.uid where T1.id=#{studioId} AND T1.del_flg=0

SELECT T1.id as studio_id,T1.name,T1.cover, (SELECT title FROM cky_honor WHERE studio_id=T1.id and del_flg=0 AND is_show=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1) AS show_honor FROM cky_studio as T1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS T2 ON T1.create_user=T2.uid WHERE T1.del_flg=0 ORDER BY T1.create_time DESC

SELECT T1.id,T1.name,T1.create_time,T2.name AS create_user FROM cky_studio AS T1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS T2 ON T1.create_user=T2.uid WHERE del_flg=0
AND T1.name like '%${name}%'
ORDER BY T1.create_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE cky_studio set del_flg=1 WHERE id IN(${ids})
